data.title: Dale Brown - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Dale Brown: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Between 1987 and 2014, this prolific author published over thirty novels, including thirteen New York Times bestsellers. Many of his works -- including Flight of the Old Dog, The Tin Man, and Air Battle Force -- focus on the adventures of a United States Air Force officer protagonist named Patrick McLanahan.

Before Fame

After earning a history degree from Pennsylvania State University, he became a United States Air Force Weapon Systems Officer. His military service earned him both a Combat Crew Award and an Air Force Commendation Medal.

Trivia

Beginning in 2001, he collaborated with fellow author Jim DeFelice on the Dreamland series of books.

Family Life

A native of Buffalo, New York, he later settled in Nevada with his wife Diane and the couple's son, Hunter.

Associated With
